content.query:
create table Hub_SalesOrder (
    SoNumber varchar(10) not null,
    Source varchar(10) not null,
    LoadDate date not null
)
with (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
DISTRIBUTION = HASH(SoNumber));
create table Hub_SalesOrderLine (
    SoNumberLine varchar(20) not null,
    SoNumber varchar(10) not null,
    SoLine varchar(10) not null,
    Source varchar(10) not null,
    LoadDate date not null
)
with (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX,
DISTRIBUTION = HASH(SoNumberLine)
);
GO
